AltName.entry: NORTHERN COUNTIES HOUSING ASSOCIATION LTD (NCHA), (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A non-profit-making organisation which provides rented property for people who need housing. Small number of properties designed for people in wheelchairs. Annual residents conference held in the summer.

Pubs.entry: News and Views, newsletter; Tenants Annual Report

ContactName.entry: John Ray, Head of East Region/Roisin Ahmed/Karleen Justin, Area Managers
